div.h4: The mission of the Griffin-Spalding County School System is to empower students to graduate college and career ready. Our vision is to be an agent of change, transforming our students into future-ready learners and contributing members of society.

h3.img: GSCS End-of-Year Guide for Students, Staff and Families 2019-2020 School YearTop of Page

span.strong: The Griffin-Spalding County School System (GSCS) will end the school year on Friday, May 8 for seniors and Friday, May 15 for students in grades Pre-K through 11. The last day of school was originally planned for Friday, May 22.
